name: The Art of Fight | 4vs4 Fast-Paced FPS
description: The Art of Fight is the fastest-paced multiplayer shooter in VR.It uses a game-changing locomotion method that avoids motion sickness allowing unparalleled 4v4 competitive battles online or against configurable bots.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: i5 Graphics: GTX 970
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 Graphics: GTX 1070
